Pre-Game Insights: Argentina have already punched their ticket to the knockout rounds of the 2024 Copa America
Peru must claim maximum points to have any chance of escaping the group stage
Lionel Scaloni's side are guaranteed a top-two finish in Group A with a game to spare
Peru are at risk of exiting the Copa America group stage for the first time since 1995
Argentina have not lost any of their previous 16 meetings with Peru
